svg.text: We align biotech incentives with decentralized governance to extend healthy human lifespan.
Biomedical breakthroughs lack aligned long-term funding and community-driven governance.
A DAO that mints governance influence based on verifiable health signals and funds longevity research.
Initial token distribution, vesting for researchers, treasury for grants; voting weighted by "healthScore".
Q1: Smart contract audit & pilot. Q2: Off-chain healthScore model integration. Q3: Grants round. Q4: Multi-chain integrations.
Founders: biotech researchers, token economists, and web3 engineers. Contact: github.com/l9999v9l
